normalised: Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Vidya Lakshmi!

unnormalised: Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to Vidya Lakshmi!
normalised: Tired of endless chai breaks trying to find the perfect scholarship, eh? Well, chill, because scholarship portals are now the hottest ed-tech trend, even hotter than Maggi at two A M! These online platforms are connecting bright minds like yours with funding opportunities faster than a Rajdhani Express.

unnormalised: Tired of endless chai breaks trying to find the perfect scholarship, eh? Well, chill, because scholarship portals are now the hottest ed-tech trend, even hotter than Maggi at 2 AM! These online platforms are connecting bright minds like yours with funding opportunities faster than a Rajdhani Express.
normalised: Forget slogging through newspaper ads and endless college notice boards. Sites like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are bringing scholarships worth lakhs, maybe even crores of Rupees, right to your fingertips.

unnormalised: Forget slogging through newspaper ads and endless college notice boards. Sites like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are bringing scholarships worth lakhs, maybe even crores of Rupees, right to your fingertips.
normalised: Think of it as the Shaadi dot com of education funding - matching your profile (academic scores, family income – you know the drill) to the best-suited scholarships. Many even let you apply directly!

unnormalised: Think of it as the Shaadi.com of education funding - matching your profile (academic scores, family income – you know the drill) to the best-suited scholarships. Many even let you apply directly!
normalised: Last week, I I T-Delhi announced a massive influx of scholarships via these portals for deserving students from twenty fourth november two thousand and twenty three onwards. So, ditch the Netflix binge this Sunday (seventeenth november two thousand and twenty four, maybe after seventeen hundred hours) and get your profile updated. Your dream of studying abroad, maybe even landing that swanky U S university scholarship, could be just a click away! Deadline for several scholarships is thirty first december two thousand and twenty four, so hurry!
